snippet: Gov. Pat Quinn is seeking to take advantage of the lame duck legislative calendar to fix the state’s underfinanced pension systems in a matter of days, after decades of failure and frustration.
abstract: Illinois Gov Pat Quinn is seeking to take advantage of lame duck legislative calendar to fix state's pension systems, most underfinanced in nation.
lead_paragraph: Gov. Pat Quinn is seeking to take advantage of the lame duck legislative calendar to fix the state’s underfinanced pension systems in a matter of days, after decades of failure and frustration.

headline.main: Illinois Governor Seeks Fast Vote on State’s Long-Troubled Pension Systems
headline.print_headline: Illinois Governor Seeks Fast Vote on State’s Long-Troubled Pension Systems
